Text: Example list of codes that can be used to indicate the type of encounter: a specific code indicating type of service provided.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:
Seen by GP with special interest ear nose & throat disorders
Face to face consultation with relative/carer
Seen in chronic obstructive pulmonary disease clinic
Follow up attendance face to face
Seen in chronic obstructive pulmonary disease clinic
Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
